channel.title: Pickup command for mods?

item.title: Pickup command for mods?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“Not existed Item Yet !”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Cmon type it right …”);
}
}

something like that

Read full topic

Heres the code

[code]if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >=1)) {
try {
int

newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int

newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if

(newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {

addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {

sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Exist”);

} catch(Exception e)

{

sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");

Anyone know whats wrong? or have a pickup code that works for mods and admins (make sure its a silab pickup)
